requirements.description: Customer Data can only be collected, submitted, processed, stored, and transmitted if it is legal, accurate, and of high quality
Customer can use Amplitude Services to process, store, and transmit Customer Data only if it complies with all applicable laws and regulations
Customer's collection, submission, and use of data must comply with all applicable laws and regulations
Customer must comply with any privacy policies, agreements, or other obligations it maintains or enters into with its end users

type.summary: Compliance with Privacy Policies and Agreements

requirements.description: Customer can collect, submit, and use data only if it obtains all legally required consents and permissions
